<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_1383184_charityb.BidValidationUtil</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Validate bid process</description><name>BidValidationUtil</name><script><![CDATA[var BidValidationUtil = Class.create();
BidValidationUtil.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

    validateBidAmount: function(itemName, bidAmount) {
        var itemGr = new GlideRecord('x_1383184_charityb_item');
        if (itemGr.get('item_name', itemName)) {
            var startBidAmount = parseFloat(itemGr.start_bid_amount);
            var highestBidAmount = parseFloat(itemGr.highest_bid_amount);

            // Validate bid amount
            if (bidAmount <= startBidAmount || bidAmount <= highestBidAmount) {
                return 'error';
            } else {
                return 'success';
            }
        } else {
            gs.info("Item not found with name: " + itemName);
            return 'error';
        }
    }
};
